node-schema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.palominosys.com/wpschema">
<complexType name="wpSettingsConferenceSite" extends="wpWebsettings"> <element name="event" type="EventSiteSettings" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </complexType>
<complexType name="EventSiteSettings" icon="wrench.png" edittype="attributes"> <attribute name="web-colour" use="oneof" value="red,blue,orange,green,purple,light-blue,light-green,brown,yellow,pink"/> <attribute name="title" use="required" value=""/> <attribute name="full-title" use="required" value=""/> <attribute name="location-city" use="oneof" value="edmonton,halifax,montreal,ottawa,toronto,vancouver"/> <attribute name="location-map" use="optional" value=""/> <attribute name="dates" use="optional" value=""/> <attribute name="registration" use="oneof" value="closed,open"/> <attribute name="twitter-feed-title" use="optional" value=""/> <attribute name="twitter-handle" use="optional" value=""/> <attribute name="number-of-tweets" use="optional" value=""/> </complexType>
</schema>
